title: Mainstreet Ventures: Distinctive Recipes from Distinctive Eateries
description: Distinctive Recipes from Mainstreet Venture's Distinctive Eateries. Serving almost 1.5 million guests in fours states each year, the restaurants of Mainstreet Ventures are themselves a unique mix of ingredients. Each have their own personality, drawing on the communities in which they are located. Chef Simon Pesusich has sifted through thousands of recipes and shares those secrets in this book.
author: Simon Pesusich
